query.statement: INSERT INTO TGW_ACC_HIS ( COMP_ID, HIS_ID, USER_ID, USER_NAME, POS, USER_IP, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME, USE_DATE, USED_TYPE ) VALUES ( :vo.compId, :vo.hisId, :vo.userId, :vo.userName, :vo.pos, :vo.userIp, :vo.deptId, :vo.deptName, TO_DATE(:vo.useDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), :vo.usedType )
DELETE FROM TGW_ACC_HIS WHERE USE_DATE <= TO_DATE(:useDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
